mapper.select: select max(history.PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER) from tbl_project_plan_history history where history.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and history.STATUS = 1 and history.PLAN_LEVEL = 0
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project_plan_history( PROJECT_ID, PLAN_CODE, PLAN_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID, DELIVERABLES, PLAN_START_DATE, PLAN_START_MILESTONE, PLAN_END_DATE, PLAN_END_MILESTONE, PLAN_DURATION, PLAN_WORKLOAD, PLAN_SCHEDULE, ACTUAL_START_DATE, ACTUAL_END_DATE, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, PLAN_LEVEL, PLAN_ORDER, PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE )values( #{projectId}, #{planCode}, #{planName}, #{responsibleUserId}, #{deliverables}, #{planStartDate}, #{planStartMilestone}, #{planEndDate}, #{planEndMilestone}, #{planDuration}, #{planWorkload}, #{planSchedule}, #{actualStartDate}, #{actualEndDate}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{planLevel}, #{planOrder}, #{projectPlanNumber}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate})
mapper.select: select history.PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER projectPlanNumber from tbl_project_plan_history history where history.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and history.STATUS = 1 and history.PLAN_LEVEL = 0 group by history.PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER order by history.PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER asc

select plan.ID id,plan.PLAN_CODE code,plan.PLAN_NAME name,plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID userId, plan.DELIVERABLES description, plan.PLAN_START_DATE start,plan.PLAN_START_MILESTONE startIsMilestone1, plan.PLAN_END_DATE 'end',plan.PLAN_END_MILESTONE endIsMilestone1,plan.PLAN_DURATION duration, plan.PLAN_LEVEL level,tui.ID userId,tui.USER_NAME userName from tbl_project_plan_history plan left join tbl_user_info tui on tui.ID = plan.RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID where plan.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and plan.PROJECT_PLAN_NUMBER = #{planNumber} and plan.STATUS = 1 and tui.STATUS = 1 order by plan.PLAN_ORDER asc
